application.name: 模板消息群发--不限次数
application.description: 利用模板消息接口,给关注用户,进行消息群发
application.author: 柒柒源码

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zjl_mass_tpl_msg_options` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `acid` int(11) NOT NULL, `tid` int(11) NOT NULL, `tpl_id` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `url` varchar(800) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `topcolor` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `post_data` text COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `addtime` int(11) NOT NULL, `thread_count` int(11) NOT NULL, `total` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zjl_mass_tpl_msg_templates` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT '模板标题', `tpl_id` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT '模板id', `template` text COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT '模板内容', `tags` varchar(1000) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL COMMENT '模板标签', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zjl_mass_tpl_msg_thread_cache` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `acid` int(11) NOT NULL, `tid` int(11) NOT NULL, `option_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `addtime` int(11) NOT NULL, `success_count` int(11) NOT NULL, `total` int(11) NOT NULL, `fanid_begin` int(11) NOT NULL, `fanid_end` int(11) NOT NULL, `nextid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
